columns.name: legal_hold_id
columns.description: ID of specific legal hold on one or more recovery points.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: This is an Amazon Resource Number (ARN) that uniquely identifies the legal hold.

columns.name: creation_date
columns.description: This is the time in number format when legal hold was created.

columns.name: status
columns.description: This is the status of the legal hold. Statuses can be ACTIVE, CREATING, CANCELED, and CANCELING.

columns.name: cancellation_date
columns.description: This is the time in number format when legal hold was cancelled.

columns.name: description
columns.description: This is the description of a legal hold.

columns.name: retain_record_until
columns.description: This is the date and time until which the legal hold record will be retained.

columns.name: recovery_point_selection
columns.description: This specifies criteria to assign a set of resources, such as resource types or backup vaults.
